DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether astaxanthin (ASX) supplementation will reduce obesity-induced oxidative stress and improve lipid profile in overweight and obese adults.
DOC.brief_title: Positive Effects of Haematococcus Astaxanthin on Oxidative Stress and Lipid Profile in Overweight and Obese Adults
DOC.criteria: Subjects with BMI over 25.0 kg/m2 Nonsmoker Excessive alcohol consumption Pregnant or lactating women Dyslipidemia, hyperglycemia, or other chronic diseases. Subjects who were taking vitamin supplements
DOC.keyword: Healthy adults with BMI over 25.0 kg/m2
